title: Renovation activities of the Akuressa Nilwala National College of Education damaged due to natural disasters
decision_details:
- The buildings and equipment of the Akuressa Nilwala National College of Education were severely damaged due to the effects of natural disasters that took place in last May and consequently, the assignment of teachers to the schools duly, has been delayed as a result of the inability to complete the training courses of teachers within the stipulated period. 

	Therefore, it is necessary to renovate those damaged buildings expeditiously and modernize same to suit the future needs and the Czech Republic has agreed to provide the financial assistance required for the purpose. As such, the proposal made by Hon. Akila Viraj Kariyawasam, the Minister of Education, to enter into a Memorandum of Understanding (MoU) to obtain financial aid amounting to Rs.15 million for carrying out the renovation and improvement activities of the Nilwala National College of Education, was approved by the Cabinet.
